FOLDER.NAME: EDW_Extracts
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Folder Holds the EDW Extract Jobs running in the Enterprise Grid

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT CTR_LTY_PNT.TXN_ID, CTR_LTY_PNT.TXN_OFFER_CD, CTR_LTY_PNT.BATCH_RUN_ID, Decode(CTR_LTY_PNT.PNT_TYP_ID,'MANUAL','B','A') FROM $$TD_EDW_LDG.CTR_LTY_PNT CTR_LTY_PNT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT PROCESS_TABLE.PROCESS_ID as PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_TABLE.PROCESS_START_DATE as PROCESS_START_DATE, PROCESS_TABLE.PROCESS_END_DATE - INTERVAL '2' HOUR as PROCESS_END_DATE, PROCESS_TABLE.PK_ID as PK_ID FROM $$EDW_IDS.PROCESS_TABLE

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_CTR_LYT_PNT.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_CTR_LYT_PNT.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_CTR_LYT_PNT.ErrorMsg

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error code for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.ErrorCode

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $Start.ErrorMsg

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Write Backward Compatible Workflow Log File
Save workflow log for these runs
Allow concurrent run with unique run instance name
Allow concurrent run with same run instance name
Maximum number of concurrent runs per Hub
